summary: Most core frontend requirements (home UI with totals + last 5, voice toggle + TTS + test button, manual paste/parse credit-only, permission explanation gate with persisted acknowledgment, Buy Me a Coffee UPI intent, dark mode + large typography + non-blue/purple theme) appear implemented. However, the required image assets are only referenced, not shown as added in the diff. The diff also introduces Internet Identity/auth and actor hooks that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Minimal app icon with microphone and rupee symbol (app-icon.dim_512x512.png) and wordmark logo “Voice UPI Alert” (logo.dim_1200x300.png) included in the project.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references these assets, but the diff summary does not show the image files being added, only HTML/TSX references to paths under /assets/generated/.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider and related hooks (login/identity management).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for authentication/login; also REQ-5 AC says no login prompts are introduced, and adding II is an unrequested capability.

hallucinated_features.description: Actor creation hook and React Query actor invalidation plumbing.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request backend calls/actors; backend has no methods and requirements state all processing stays client-side for this prototype.

hallucinated_features.description: UPI payment fallback alert popup after attempting to open the UPI intent.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-5 only specifies opening a UPI intent/payment link; the additional alert-based fallback UI is extra behavior not requested (though it may be harmless).
